about_the_game:
In the extras you will find a ZIP file containing the following:
- PDF document with a walkthrough to get all the album images.
- PDF document with a walkthrough to unlock all the achievements.
- By unlocking all the achievements, you will get access to the Side Content material, featuring Mrs. Evans and Elizabeth. (This content is available in the main game, you don't need this package to unlock it!.)
- All Patreon perks released until now. (around 43 images)
- Extras never released (characters test, poses, videos, etc.)
- 2 test animation videos featuring Erika.

content_descriptors.notes: This downloadable content features images and videos showcasing game models posing provocatively, both clothed and unclothed.

detailed_description:
In the extras you will find a ZIP file containing the following:
- PDF document with a walkthrough to get all the album images.
- PDF document with a walkthrough to unlock all the achievements.
- By unlocking all the achievements, you will get access to the Side Content material, featuring Mrs. Evans and Elizabeth. (This content is available in the main game, you don't need this package to unlock it!.)
- All Patreon perks released until now. (around 43 images)
- Extras never released (characters test, poses, videos, etc.)

name: Pleasure Thieves - Extras

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Unlock the full potential of your gaming experience with our Ultimate Guide! This comprehensive package includes a complete guide to unlock all album pictures and achievements. As a bonus, gain access to exclusive Patreon images and some never-before-seen extra images and test videos.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Russian
